ja423:5.4: jīvantova visussati → jīvantopi visussati (s2, s3) | jīvareva visussati (pts1) | jīvanto vāpi sussati (mr)
ja423:6.3: Sosi → sopi (s2, s3, pts1, mr), sukhā → sukha (s2, s3) | sukhaṃ (mr)
ja423:9.1: gahapatī → gahapatiṃ (bj) | gahapataṃ (s2, s3, pts1) | gahavataṃ (?)
ja423:10.2: api so → asito (bj, s2, s3, pts1), devilo → devalo (bj, pts1)
